document.full_text: an experimental drug for the liver-damaging hepatitis c virus offers an advance over the current decade-old treatment that cures only a minority of patients, maker merck & co told a u.s. advisory panel on wednesday.
document.title: merck pitches hepatitis c drug to u.s. fda panel
lines_and_colors: an experimental drug for the liver-damaging hepatitis c virus offers an advance over the current decade-old treatment that cures only a minority of patients, maker merck & co told a u.s. advisory panel on wednesday.
